trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for resources that can be added to an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Definisce la classe di base per risorse che possono essere aggiunte a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> derived types to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come aggiungere <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> ai tipi derivati di un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes and flushes the resource to the document package.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il commit di tutte le modifiche e scarica la risorsa nel pacchetto del documento.

trans-unit.source: Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method may be delayed until the whole <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
trans-unit.target: In base alle impostazioni di <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, l'operazione di scaricamento del <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> metodo pu√≤ essere ritardato fino a quando l'intero <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> viene chiuso.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method (in a derived class) when you add resources to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> metodo (in una classe derivata) quando si aggiungono le risorse per un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the I/O stream for reading or writing the resource.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce il flusso di I/O per la lettura o la scrittura della risorsa.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> for reading or writing the resource.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> per la lettura o la scrittura della risorsa.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method (in a derived class) to add resources to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare questo metodo (in una classe derivata) per aggiungere risorse a un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource that is relative to a specified absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della risorsa relativo a un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] assoluto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the resource that is relative to the specified absolute <paramref name="inUri" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> della risorsa relativo all'<paramref name="inUri" /> assoluto specificato.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro supporta l'infrastruttura di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.
